name: Crawdaunt
description: The Rogue Pokémon. Crawdaunt molts (sheds) its shell regularly. Immediately after molting, its shell is soft and tender. Until the shell hardens, this Pokémon hides in its streambed burrow to avoid attack from its foes.

abilities.name: Hyper Cutter
abilities.description: This Pokémon’s attack or damage bonuses cannot be decreased by an opponent’s moves.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to extra damage dealt by a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: Adaptability
abilities.description: When this Pokémon uses a move of its own type, it may roll the damage twice and choose either total.
